turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I 'd like to order three small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pepperoni, one meat lovers, and one veggie lovers. And all of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you have ordered 3 small pizzas with extra cheese, one meat lovers, one veggie lovers and one pepperoni pizza, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $45, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That'll be it for me. Thank you.
